6'b000000 = <space>
6'b000001 = 0
6'b000010 = 1
6'b000011 = 2
6'b000100 = 3
6'b000101 = 4
6'b000110 = 5
6'b000111 = 6
6'b001000 = 7
6'b001001 = 8
6'b001010 = 9
6'b001011 = A
6'b001100 = B
6'b001101 = C
6'b001110 = D
6'b001111 = E
6'b010000 = F
6'b010001 = G
6'b010010 = H
6'b010011 = I
6'b010100 = J
6'b010101 = K
6'b010110 = L
6'b010111 = M
6'b011000 = N
6'b011001 = O
6'b011010 = P
6'b011011 = Q
6'b011100 = R
6'b011101 = S
6'b011110 = T
6'b011111 = U
6'b100000 = V
6'b100001 = W
6'b100010 = X
6'b100011 = Y
6'b100100 = Z
6'b100101 = .
6'b100110 = ,
6'b100111 = :
6'b101000 = !
